text: Het politieke correctheid beperkt ons in het delen van informatie over preventie van Covid-19, maar we moeten ons eigen onderzoek doen en elkaar waarschuwen voor de feitelijke gegevens.   Translation:Political correctness limits us in sharing information about Covid-19 prevention, but we must do our own research and warn each other about the real facts.   -----------------Explanation:In this post, I express my skepticism towards the mainstream narrative on Covid-19 prevention and my belief in the importance of sharing information freely, even if it goes against the mainstream narrative. I use the hashtags  and  to emphasize my stance on this issue and to connect with like-minded individuals. The use of the Dutch language is intended to cater to my native audience and to maintain a sense of authenticity in my online presence.
